Question
========
  
A researcher wants to know if gifted students who take enrichment classes develop creativity differently than gifted students who do not take these classes. He conducts a repeated measures ANOVA.

What effect in the SPSS output should he look at to answer his question? 
Answerlist
----------
* Within-subject effect of Time
* Within-Subject effect of Time*Lessons
* Within-subject effect of Lessons
* Between-Subject effect of Lessons

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
